|rad2chip2 = Qualcomm;QCN5054;Q, QCN5054, 007, FE743RQR; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 8 |rad2rxchains = 8 |rad2sstreams = 8 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 4804 |acqam2 = 3464 |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 1200 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Netgear Nighthawk AX12 12-Stream AX6000 WiFi Router (RAX120-100EUS) :WAN: 1x 1GbE, LAN: 4x 1GbE + 1x 5GbE ports (1G/2.5G/5G [https://www.snbforums.com/attachments/6292280cv11d-jpg.14824/ Multi-Gig]) {{FCC ST|03/03/2019|indexme.}} {{SCollapse|Specifications (FCC Doc, Aquantia LAN chip, DFS certification) â€¢ >> | *This device went by the code name '''Leopard''' during development and in FCC documents. :It is likely to be released as the '''Netgear RAX120 (Nighthawk AX12)'''. '''FCC''' documents appear to show that this device is 8x8 for channel bandwidths up to 80MHz
but it drops down to 4x4:4 operation when using VHT80+80 or HE80+80 channel bandwidths. *The '''[[Aquantia]]''' LAN chip's ID is not clear. It is AQR11x but the third digit is not clear. Aquantia does not list any AQR11x parts on their website but an AQR112 has been spotted in
the ''[[Everest Networks AP1004WRi]]'' and internet searches suggest that an AQR111 could exist. *'''DFS''' certification was added with a Class II Product Change request on 3/15/2019. :The software/firmware version used in the tests was V1.0.0.65-DFS-20181121. :The latest firmware available on the Netgear website is [https://kb.netgear.com/000060382/RAX120-Firmware-Version-1-0-0-64 1.0.0.64] as of 3/15/2019. }} *Web GUI: http://www.routerlogin.net {{WiFiCert|WFA79402|11/20/2018}} Blurb from Netgear
802.11ax Dual-Band WiFi (AX6000).
2.4GHz AX: 4x4 (Tx/Rx) 1024 QAM 20/40MHz, up to '''1.2Gbps'''.
5GHz AX: 8x8 (Tx/Rx) 1024-QAM 20/40/80/160MHz, up to '''4.8Gbps'''.
Backwards compatible with 802.11a/b/g/n/ac WiFi

AX11000 Router'' on '''SNB''' forums] *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/netgear-nighthawk-ax12-router-outed-by-qatar-isp.49386/ ''Netgear Nighthawk AX12 Router Outed by Qatar ISP'' on '''SNB''' forums] ===News=== *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/13325/netgear-announces-nighthawk-rax80-rax120 ''Netgear Announces Nighthawk RAX80 and RAX120'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[https://www.gulf-times.com/story/609458/Ooredoo-to-launch-advanced-fibre-technology-in-Lus ''Ooredoo to launch advanced fibre technology in Lusail'' on '''Gulf Times'''] *[https://www.forbes.com/sites/tiriasresearch/2018/10/20/netgear-boosts-wi-fi-with-new-nighthawk-ax12-router ''Netgear Boosts Wi-Fi with new Nighthawk AX12 Router'' on '''Forbes'''] *[https://24wireless.info/list-of-11ax-routers ''List of 802.11ax Routers'' on '''24wireless.info'''] ([https://www.netgear.com/about/press-releases/2019/NETGEAR-ANNOUNCES-ORBI-MESH-WI-FI-SYSTEM.aspx Orbi Mesh]) *https://fccid.io/PY317300397 ==Pictures==
